ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: There are items that are +charisma everywhere ! The leatherfoot cap is +10, the medal of valor is +5, there is a light source that is +3, people with
ygData.messageBody:
There are items that are +charisma everywhere !

The leatherfoot cap is +10, the medal of valor is +5,
there is a light source that is +3, people with
jewelcraft can make rings and earrings that are up to
+9, shamans can cast spirit of the snake on you to
give you up to +30.

Just ask around a bit when you are on.



> -----Original Message-----
> From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 11:16 PM
> To: EverQuest@onelist.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Crude Stein
>
>
> From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
>
> Can anyone verify if the Crude Stein is found in Cazic Thule on Bouncer
> Hurd? If so, where can Bouncer Hurd be found? Also, how rare is he of a
> spawn (and for that matter, how rare is the stein?) I really need
> this item
> to help lower costs of supplies for my smithing skill.
>
